Class SameGameModel.PredefinedColors

java.lang.Object
com.aoopproject.games.samegame.SameGameModel.PredefinedColors
Enclosing class:
SameGameModel
public static class SameGameModel.PredefinedColors extends Object
Helper inner class to define a palette of standard colors for the game tiles and a placeholder color for empty slots created during internal game logic (e.g., after gravity or column compaction). This class and its fields are public static to be accessible by tests or other related utility classes for consistent color referencing.

  • Field Details

    • PALETTE

      public static final List<Color> PALETTE
      The list of available standard colors for game tiles.

    • EMPTY_SLOT_COLOR

      public static final Color EMPTY_SLOT_COLOR
      A placeholder color used internally for SameGameTiles that are marked as empty (e.g., after tiles are removed and gravity applied). This helps in debugging and ensures that even "empty" tiles in the grid are non-null SameGameTile objects. The visual representation of such tiles should be handled by the view based on their isEmpty() state.
